prompt:
I have the following count table for an RNA-seq experiment, rows are genes and columns are samples, "Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx". The first column of the file is my gene names and the rest of the columns are samples. My annotation data is here  "SRP021193.colData.tsv", it contains sample annotations and rows of this matches the columns of count table, first column is the sample ids. Find genes specific for each "group" in my annotation data  using statistical tests. Plot PCA only using "group" specific genes and color code PCA by "group" variable in my annotation data.

response:
```
# Load required libraries
library(DESeq2)
library(ggplot2)

# Read count table
counts <- read.table("Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx", header=TRUE, row.names=1)
# Transpose the count table
counts <- t(counts)

# Read annotation data
annotation <- read.table("SRP021193.colData.tsv", header=TRUE)

# Create a DESeqDataSet object
dds <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData = counts,
                              colData = annotation,
                              design = ~ group)

# Perform differential expression analysis
dds <- DESeq(dds)

# Get the results
result <- results(dds)

# Get group specific genes
group_specific_genes <- subset(result, padj < 0.05)

# Create a PCA plot using group specific genes
pca <- prcomp(t(assay(dds)[rownames(group_specific_genes), ]))
pca_df <- as.data.frame(pca$x)
pca_df$group <- annotation$group

# Plot PCA
ggplot(pca_df, aes(x = PC1, y = PC2, color = group)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "PCA Plot", x = "PC1", y = "PC2")
```
Note: Make sure to replace "Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx" and "SRP021193.colData.tsv" with the correct file paths in your system.
